install.name: JB Corporate
install.author: Anthony Olsen
install.description: The corporate Joomla template is a flexible, responsive and clean Joomla template. It features a full width background slideshow, 26 whopping Colour schemes and a clean business minded aesthetic.

field.name: bannerHeight
field.label: Banner Height on Front page
field.description: This setting controls the height of the banner module.

field.name: bannerSubHeight
field.label: Banner Height
field.description: This settign controls the height of the banner image.

field.desc: Layout / Top and Header row of modules
Top1 to Top4 row of modules
Header1 to Header4 row of modules
Layout / Left, Center, Middle and Right

field.name: css3pierules
field.default: .rounded, .corner, .gradient, .boxshadow,\n.zenbutton span a, .zenbutton input, .zenmore a > span, input.button, button.zenbutton, .zenbutton input, #socialicons a
field.label: ZENCSS3PIERULES

param.description: This setting controls the height of the banner module.

param.label: Banner Height
param.description: This settign controls the height of the banner image.
